Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Omiscid::SimpleList< TYPE >

Template class to manage list of object.

This class provides methods to go through the list elements. It is possble to delete an element and then go to the next. It is possible to delete an element by giving its value.

Author:
Dominique Vaufreydaz

Definition at line 77 of file SimpleList.h.

00391         // We must call at least First on a non empty list

00403         // PreviousElement == NULL

00415     }

00419     {
00420         // We have remove the last item of the list
00421         Tail = PreviousElement;
00422     }
00423

00425     ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00426
00427     // Change the element count
00428     NumberOfElements--;
00429
00430     return true;
